API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.animation.Tag

type
class
version
3.2
Representation of an MD3 style tag structure. The quaternion property is updated when the matrix is updated, so it is available for quick interpolations.

Static Variables

read(default,method) : data : sandy.Bytes -> numFrames : Int -> numTags : Int -> dataOrder : sandy.util.DataOrder -> Hash<sandy.TypedArray<Tag>>
